snippet: The demolitions on Saturday were the most sweeping use of a recently revived, controversial antiterrorism measure since unrest escalated last month.
abstract: Israeli forces destroy West Bank family homes of three Palestinian men charged with carrying out October drive-by shooting that killed  couple in front of their four children; authorities also demolish home of man accused of fatally shooting Israeli in June; actions mark most sweeping use of much criticized antiterrorism measure since uptick in killings that began in October.
lead_paragraph: The demolitions on Saturday were the most sweeping use of a recently revived, controversial antiterrorism measure since unrest escalated last month.
